question.text: Although measures have been introduced to discourage the use of mobile telephones inside the opera house,___ effectiveness remains limited.

answer.explanation: The answer comes before a noun so we use "their".

question.text: ___ the new computers are arriving next week, no plans have been made to dispose of the old ones.

answer.explanation:
Whereby = By which
The two clauses have different meanings so we use "although".

question.text: Payment is ___ at the time you check out of the conference center.

answer.explanation: "Expect" in its active voice is only used by humans so the answer is in its passive voice.

question.text: Recent sales figures contrast___ with those prior to the launch of Lido Foods’ aggressive advertising campaign.

answer.explanation: We are giving more information on the verb "contrast" so we use an adverb.

question.text: The department-wide changes suggested ___ Ms. Juntasa received unanimous approval from company management.

answer.explanation: "Suggested" is the shortened version of the relative clause "which were suggested". The verb is in its passive voice so we use "by".

question.text: As stated in the company guidelines, sales agents receive ___ for time spent traveling to meet with clients.

answer.explanation: Compensation for st = Reward for st = Making up for st

question.text: In Mr. Brothet’s performance review, the department supervisor wrote that he worked extremely ___ and always finished his assignments on time.

answer.explanation:
We are giving more information on the verb "worked" so we use an adverb.
Diligently = Carefully

question.text: When their first tests failed, the engineers at OKM Corporation agreed it was ___ to try using different materials.

answer.explanation: It is/was time to do st

question.text: Ms. Pieraccini had ___ finished editing the budget report when she noticed an error In the title page.

answer.explanation:
Nearly = Almost
"Nearly" is the only answer that comes before verbs.

question.text: The license for the trial version of Exi 2.0 software is valid for the 30-day period immediately ___ the date of issue.

answer.explanation: "Immediately following" is the shortened version of "which immediately follows".
